name: Fire the Crier
description:
By Ishan D., Christian W., and Jasmine Z.

You are a fireman trying to rescue the crying baby, and take the baby back home!

Be careful with the falling lotus leaves, spikes that might came out, and enemies!

You can kill the enemies by jumping on them, or toss the baby to attract the flying enemies’ attention!
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
